original: Milindapañha
analyzed: milindapañha

original: Opammakathāpañha
analyzed: opamma kathā pañha

original: Makkaṭakavagga
analyzed: makkaṭaka vagga

original: 8. Māgavikaṅgapañha
“Bhante nāgasena, ‘māgavikassa cattāri aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṁ vadesi, katamāni tāni cattāri aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
analyzed: bhante nāgasena māgavikassa cattāri aṅgāni gahetabbāni iti yam vadesi katamāni tāni cattāri aṅgāni gahetabbāni iti

original: “Yathā, mahārāja, māgaviko appamiddho hoti;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja māgavikaḥ appamiddhaḥ hoti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena appamiddhena bhavitabbaṁ.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena appamiddhena

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, māgavikassa paṭhamaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja māgavikassa paṭhamam aṅgam

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, māgaviko migesuyeva cittaṁ upanibandhati;
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja māgavikaḥ migesuyā iva cittam upanibandhati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ārammaṇesuyeva cittaṁ upanibandhitabbaṁ.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena ārammaṇesu yeva cittam

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, māgavikassa dutiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja māgavikassa dutiyam aṅgam

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, māgaviko kālaṁ kammassa jānāti;
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja māgavikaḥ kālam kammassa jānāti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena paṭisallānassa kālo jānitabbo ‘ayaṁ kālo paṭisallānassa, ayaṁ kālo nikkhamanāyā’ti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena paṭisallānassa kālaḥ jānitabbaḥ ayam kālo paṭisallānassa ayam kālo nikkhamanāya ati

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, māgavikassa tatiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja māgavikassa tatiyam aṅgam gahetabba

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, māgaviko migaṁ disvā hāsamabhijaneti ‘imaṁ lacchāmī’ti;
analyzed: punar capara mahā rāja māgavikaḥ migam disvā hāsam abhijaneti imam lacchāmi iti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ārammaṇe abhiramitabbaṁ, hāsamabhijanetabbaṁ ‘uttariṁ visesamadhigacchissāmī’ti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena ārammaṇe hāsam abhijanetabbam uttarim visesam adhigacchissāmi iti

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, māgavikassa catutthaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja māgavikassa catuttham aṅgam

original: Bhāsitampetaṁ, mahārāja, therena mogharājena—
analyzed: mahā rāja therena mogharājena

original: ‘Ārammaṇe labhitvāna,
analyzed: ārammaṇe

original: Pahitattena bhikkhunā;
analyzed: pahitattena bhikkhunā

original: Bhiyyo hāso janetabbo,
analyzed: bhiyyaḥ hāsaḥ janetabbaḥ

original: Adhigacchissāmi uttarin’”ti.
analyzed: adhigacchissāmi uttarinti

original: Māgavikaṅgapañho aṭṭhamo.
analyzed: māgavika aṅga pañhaḥ aṭṭhamo
